title: McDonalds Fight Blender:An Argument Over An Incorrect Order Turned Ugly, McDonalds Employee Whacks Customer With Blender

Nasty Fight Ensues In US McDonald's Outlet Over Wrong Order, Employer Whacks Customer With Blender

Nasty Fight Ensues In US McDonald's Outlet Over Wrong Order, Employer Whacks Customer With Blender

In another argument gone wrong at a McDonald's outlet, an employee, mad with rage, hurled a blender at a woman customer.

According to reports, the argument started over an order for some of McDonald's' signature cheeseburgers and Happy Meals.

Twitter

"I wanted to get some Happy Meals and some cheeseburgers and that was a very unhappy day for me," the customer named Brittany Price was quoted as saying.

But Britany Price wasn’t lovin’ it when her drive through order took more than twenty minutes. Finally, she went out to her car to get the food she had ordered.

VIDEO: A wrong order leads to a customer-manager food fight at McDonald's in Colerain Township.

The manager apparently throws a blender at the customer, and it ricochets off her face, knocking her to the ground: https://t.co/JKYnmBKsQO pic.twitter.com/WxCGcs0M0O — WLWT (@WLWT) October 23, 2019

Feeling she was being ignored by McDonald’s staffers, Price demanded a refund, then started throwing food over the counter.

It was then that the the employee picked up a blender from behind the counter and threw it at the Price.

The machine hit her in the face and knocked her, she is seen struggling to get back up.

Price's attorney said they are now pursuing a civil lawsuit against McDonald's, reports wlwt. No criminal charges have been filed in the case, according to the prosecutor's office.
